greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of column 3 of table described in A051714/A051715.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
M. Kaneko, The Akiyama-Tanigawa algorithm for Bernoulli numbers, J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #00.2.9.
mathematica: a[0, k_] := 1/(k+1); a[n_, k_] := a[n, k] = (k+1)*(a[n-1, k] - a[n-1, k+1]); a[n_] := a[n, 3] // Denominator; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 39}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 17 2012 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
ext: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Dec 08 1999
